Cosmetic Dentistry

Transform your smile with our advanced cosmetic treatments. From whitening to complete smile makeovers.

Your Dream Smile Awaits

Modern cosmetic dentistry combines art and science to create beautiful, natural-looking smiles. Whether you want a subtle enhancement or a complete transformation, we have the solution for you.

Popular Cosmetic Treatments

Zoom! Teeth Whitening

Professional whitening that brightens teeth up to 8 shades in just one hour.

Learn more →

Invisalign® Clear Aligners

Straighten your teeth discreetly without traditional metal braces.

Learn more →

Porcelain Veneers

Custom-made shells that perfect your smile's shape, size, and color.

Learn more →

Dental Bonding

Quick, affordable fix for chips, gaps, and minor imperfections.

Learn more →

Complete Smile Makeovers

A smile makeover combines multiple cosmetic treatments to achieve your ideal smile. During your consultation, we'll design a personalized treatment plan that may include:

  • 1
    Teeth whitening for a brighter foundation
  • 2
    Orthodontics to perfect alignment
  • 3
    Veneers or bonding for shape and size
  • 4
    Gum contouring for ideal proportions
  • 5
    Crown replacement for consistency
  • 6
    Final polish and perfection

The Consultation Process

  1. 1. Discuss your smile goals and concerns
  2. 2. Complete examination and digital imaging
  3. 3. Review treatment options and timeline
  4. 4. Create your personalized treatment plan
  5. 5. Discuss investment and payment options

Why Choose Us?

  • Advanced training in cosmetic dentistry
  • State-of-the-art technology and materials
  • Hundreds of smile transformations
  • Flexible payment and financing options

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does cosmetic dentistry cost?

Costs vary widely depending on the treatments you choose. Simple procedures like whitening start around $500, while comprehensive smile makeovers can range from $5,000 to $30,000. We offer flexible payment plans and will provide a detailed quote during your consultation.

How long do cosmetic treatments last?

With proper care: Teeth whitening lasts 1-3 years, bonding 3-10 years, veneers 10-15 years, and crowns 10-20 years. Regular dental care and good oral hygiene help maximize longevity.

Will my insurance cover cosmetic dentistry?

Most cosmetic procedures are not covered by insurance. However, treatments that also restore function (like crowns or some bonding) may have partial coverage. We'll help you understand your benefits and maximize any available coverage.
